com.googlecode.prmf.merapi.net.irc.cmd
Class AbstractIrcCommand

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.prmf.merapi.net.irc.cmd.AbstractIrcCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
IrcCommand
Direct Known Subclasses:
InviteCommand, IrcNicknameCommand, IrcTargetMessageCommand, IrcTargetsCommand, JoinCommand, KickCommand, PassCommand, QuitCommand, UnknownCommand, UserCommand
public abstract class AbstractIrcCommand
extends Object
implements IrcCommand

Some library methods facilitating validation in IRC commands. Subclass this class to get them.

Author:
Miorel-Lucian Palii

Constructor Summary

          Default constructor, does nothing.

validateString

protected static void validateString(String identifier,
                                     String string,
                                     boolean nullAllowed,
                                     boolean emptyAllowed)
Validates some string.

Parameters:
identifier - a description of what is being validated for use in exception messages
string - the string to validate
nullAllowed - whether the string being validated is allowed to be null
emptyAllowed - whether the string being validated is allowed to be the empty string
